name: Guardian Angel (Alex Yang)
description:
The game is about the encouragement and courage. Throughout the story, the police fight with terrorists and protect their homeland. There are dramatic action descriptions and moving plots in the game, which creates the view in a dying world.

If you like the introduction of the game, please download it and play. I am glad to receive your suggestions.

Also, I need to mention that this content of the game is created by myself, and the novel, as well as the game, is my first work. So, as I mention in the release status, it is just a prototype and I just want to test my ideas and ability to write. I hope that later, I can talk this game with other students in my game design club, and complete a better game for players.

This is the game Guardian Angel created by Alex Yang. This is the graduate assignment for University of South California summer program (Introduction to Game Design) in 2021. 

In this game and the trailer, some of the music and picture coming from the Internet. I promise that I will not use this game for any profits.
